title: Disappearance
description: One moment a woman is deciding between two largely identical brands of salt-and-vinegar potato chips; the next she is gone. After the inexplicable, frightening Disappearance, the survivors of Toronto are left to wander the streets in a daze, wondering what is to come next. For Mark, it means a second chance at happiness with his pregnant ex-girlfriend. For the antisocial Jason, it means being on the ground floor of a world that might finally be to his liking. The chance to build a utopia is finally at hand - but the hungry wolf of dystopia is always lurking in the shadows...
author: Trevor James Zaple
